text: Niwaba ufise igitangaro, rero ico gutangaza gusumba n’imvugo yabo ivuga iti:- mbega nitwaba twamaze kuba ivu, nivy’ukuri tuzoba murindi remwa rishasha, abo nibo bantu bahakanye Umuremyi wabo, kandi abo nibo bazoba bafise ibiziriko mumazosi yabo kandi abo nyene nibo bantu bo mumuriro udahera, muriwo bazowubamwo mu buzima bwabo bwose
